articles.title: Injury update: Sam Kerr | News | Official Site - Chelsea FC
articles.description: Chelsea Football Club can confirm striker Sam Kerr has sustained an anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) injury during our warm weather training camp in Morocco.
articles.content:
Chelsea Football Club can confirm striker Sam Kerr has sustained an anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) injury during our warm weather training camp in Morocco.
 Sam will be assessed by a specialist in… [+430 chars]
